desc.eng: Note that selling is done at 80% of the build cost.
Continuously damages enemies with Fire damage.

effect0.eng: Enemies stepping on the trap take %trapdamage_ Fire damage per second.

Desc.eng: Enemies are ignited taking %firedotdamage_ of the original damage for 6 seconds (5%/level)
Increases damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Enemies are disoriented for %disorientduration_ seconds (2 seconds/level), unable to attack or use abilities (but still able to move)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap construction cost by %buildcostdecrease_ (1/level)

desc.eng: A continuously active trap that has a chance of instantly killing horde and normal type enemies when they first step on it. Enemies (of any type) that aren't instantly killed take Fire and Lightning damage instead. Instantly killed enemies do not generate Essence.

effect0.eng: Horde type creatures have a %hordekillchance_ chance of being instantly killed

effect1.eng: Normal type creatures have a %normalkillchance_ chance of being instantly killed

effect2.eng: Enemies that aren't killed instantly take %trapdamage_ Fire/Lightning damage

Desc.eng: Killed enemies generate %essencedropvalue_ of their essence worth (20%/level)
Increases damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Enemies that are killed instantly have a %disintegrationblastchance_ chance (10%/level) to generate an explosion which deals Fire/Lightning damage equal to their maximum health within 1.5 meters
Increases damage by %damageincrease_ (5%/level)
The instant kill chance for horde creatures is increased by %chancehorde_ (1%/level) and %chancenormal_ for normal creatures (0.5%/level)
Kill %d Mythical enemies

desc.eng: When inactive, this trap generates a charge every 3 seconds up to a maximum of 5 charges. These are used for interim attacks at half time between regular ones. Each such attack uses up one charge.

effect0.eng: Damages a single enemy for %trapdamage_ Lightning damage

Desc.eng: Each time the trap attacks, there is a 50% chance it will attack %additionaltargets_ (1/level) more target(s)
Attack range is increased by %traprangebonus_ meters (2 meters/level)
Maximum charge capacity is increased to %chargecapincrease_ (2/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap reset time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.02 seconds/level)

desc.eng: Lobs slow moving explosive shells in a high arc, which deal damage within 4 meters of their impact point.

effect0.eng: Deals %trapdamage_ Physical/Fire damage in a 4 meters area.

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (1.5 seconds/level)
Increases the shell's travel speed by %projectilespeedincrease_ (25%/level)
Targets have a %knockback_ chance of being knocked down (15%/level), and increases base damage by +%knockback_ (15%/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Increases area of effect by %areaeffectbonus_ meters (0.1 meters/level)
Fully upgrade %d mechanical towers in one mission (only succesful missions count)

desc.eng: Launches razor sharp discs that go through all enemies in their path dealing full damage to the first enemy, then 30% less damage to each subsequent enemy.

effect0.eng: Damages a single enemy for %trapdamage_ Physical/Poison damage

Desc.eng: Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (30%/level)
Decreases damage penalty to subsequent targets by %passthroughdamagepenaltydecrease_ (10%/level)
Each time the trap attacks, there is a %multirazorchance_ (15%/level) chance it will launch a second disc
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap reset time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.1 seconds/level)
Kill %d enemies yourself

desc.eng: Shoots a beam of energy at a single target continuously damaging them. It also heals 20% of the damage on a player or an allied creature within 12 meters. If there are multiple players or allied creatures wihin range, the healing effect is distributed evenly among them.

Desc.eng: The beam has a 50% chance of bouncing onto %beambouncecount_ (1/level) additional targets
Attack range is increased by %traprangebonus_ meters (2 meters/level)
Each time the trap kills an enemy, there is a %healingwavechance_ (10%/level) chance that allied creatures and players within 12 meters will be healed to their maximum health
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
The healing amount is increased by %healbonus_ (2%/level)
Poison %d enemies (with damage over time effect)

desc.eng: Any enemies who die in or near the pit have a chance of turning into a Ghoulkin. Ghoulkin exist for 45 seconds and fight on the player's side. The pit can control a maximum of 3 Ghoulkin at a time.

effect0.eng: %creaturespwanchance_ chance to create a Ghoulkin from a dead enemy

Desc.eng: The pit can control %creaturecount_ (1/level) more Ghoulkin
Ghoulkin have %creaturehealthincrease_ (50%/level) more maximum health
Ghoulkin deal %creaturedamageincrease_ (50%/level) more damage
Ghoulkin creation chance is increased by %spawnchance_ (1%/level)
Ghoulkin lifetime is increased by %creaturelifetimebonus_ second (1/level).
Kill %d undead enemies with floor traps

desc.eng: Summons a Winter Queen spirit who fights on your side. The spirit casts blizzard spells at enemies when they step within range. The spell does damage in a 3 meter radius area.

effect0.eng: The blizzard spell does %spelldamage_ Ice damage

Desc.eng: Blizzard spell cooldown is decreased by %spellcooldowndecrease_ seconds (1 second/level)
Increases Blizzard spell damage by +%spelldelaydecrease_ (30%/level)
The spirit has %creaturehealthincrease_ (50%/level) more health
The Winter Queen's spell damage is increased by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
The Winter Queen's spell affects a %areaeffectbonus_ meters (0.1 meters/level) larger area.
Finish %d Flawless missions

desc.eng: Sprays jets of corrosive toxin within the area when enemies step on the trap. Enemies are also afflicted by 30% vulnerability against physical damage for 10 seconds (This does not stack with itself)

Desc.eng: Enemies are poisoned taking %poisondamage_ (5%/level) of the original damage for 6 seconds
Physical Vulnerability is increased to %vulnerability_ (30%/level)
Each attack generates a toxic cloud which remains in place for 3 seconds. Enemies entering the cloud take %poisonclouddamage_ (10%/level) of the original damage per second
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap reset time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.1 seconds/level)

desc.eng: Impales enemies with sharp spears when they step on the trap.

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.5 seconds/level)
Increases damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Enemies are poisoned taking %poisondamage_ (5%/level) of the original damage for 5 seconds
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
There is a %essencebonus_ (3%/level) chance that killed enemies reward double essence.
Deal %d Physical damage

desc.eng: The trap's blades whirl around when enemies pass within 5 meters of the column, damaging and slowing them down considerably.

effect0.eng: Damages enemies within 5 meters for %trapdamage_ Physical damage per second.

effect1.eng: Slows enemies by %slowingvalue_ % while in range.

desc.eng: Pushes enemies aside and knocks them down, also dealing some Physical damage to them. Enemies who fall off ledges die instantly.

effect1.eng: Knocks enemies down or throws them to their death.

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.5 seconds/level)
Increases damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Splashes oil on enemies within an 8 meter radius on activation, afflicting them with %firevulnerability_ (30%/level) vulnerability against fire.
Trap build cost is decreased by %trapbuildcostdecrease_ (1/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Cause knockback effect %d times (skills and traps both count)

desc.eng: Enemies who die near this trap reward more essence.

effect0.eng: %essencedropportion_ more essence from creatures killed near the trap

Desc.eng: There is a %tripleessencechance_ (10%/level) chance that enemies will reward 3 times their essence worth when they die
Afflicts enemies with %poisonvulnerability_ (30%/level) vulnerability against poison damage
There is a %stunchance_ (10%/level) chance that enemies will be stunned for 3 seconds when they first step on the trap (triggers only once per enemy)
Killed creatures drop %essencebonus_ (10%/level) more essence.
Each essence trap increases the efficiency of each essence trap by %networkbonus_ (5%/level)
Finish a level without spending 50% of the total available essence

desc.eng: Attaches a small bomb to enemies who step on the trap with a small chance of success. When an enemy with an attached bomb dies, an explosion occurs that deals Fire damage within 3 meters around them.

effect0.eng: %chancetoattachbomb_ chance of attaching a bomb to enemies stepping on the trap

effect1.eng: Bombed enemies deal %trapdamage_ Fire damage when they die

Desc.eng: The bomb explosion ignites the ground for 3 seconds. Enemies who step into the fire take %firedotdamage_ (10%/level) of the original damage per second
Increases the explosion area of effect by %blastradiusincrease_ meters (0.5 meters/level)
There is a %attachchanceincrease_ (10%/level) chance that the trap attaches a second mine to an enemy
The chance of succesfully attaching a bomb is increased by %bombchancebonus_ (0,5%/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Fully upgrade %d mechanical floor traps in one mission (only succesful missions count)

desc.eng: Enemies take Ice damage and are slowed for 5 seconds when they first step on the trap (Triggers once per enemy).

Desc.eng: Increases the slow effect by %slowincrease_ (10%/level) and the effect lasts one more second
Increases damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Afflicts enemies with %vulnerabilityincrease_ (30%/level) vulnerability against ice damage
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Damaged creatures have a %freezechance_ (1%/level) chance if being frozen for 5 seconds.
Cause slow effect %d times

desc.eng: Enemies stepping on the trap have a 20% chance of being teleported some distance back on their path. This can only happen once for each enemy.

effect0.eng: Teleports enemies back on their path

Desc.eng: Increases teleport chance by %teleportchance_ (10%/level)
Teleported enemies lose %hitpointpercentloss_ (10%/level) of their maximum health
Afflicts enemies with %vulnerabilityincrease_ (15%/level) vulnerability against lightning damage
Increases teleport chance by %teleportchance_ (1%/level)
Increases teleport distance by %teleportdistance_ meters (0,5 meter/level)
Fully upgrade %d magical floor traps in one mission (only successful missions count)

desc.eng: Creates three stasis bubbles that can each entrap a single creature that touches them. The bubbles deal physical damage to entrapped creatures and hold them for 5 seconds. The bubbles respawn periodically. Giant size creaures cannot be held.Enemies who survive entrapment cannot be affected by another stasis bubble for 5 seconds.

Desc.eng: Held enemies take an additional %dotdamage_ (10%/level) of the initial damage per second
Increases hold time by %holddurationincrease_ (2 seconds/level) seconds
Decreases bubble respawn time by %cooldowndecrease_ (1 second/level) seconds
Decreases trap build cost by %trapbuildcostdecrease_ (1/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Immobilize (stun or freeze) %d enemies

desc.eng: A large automated gun sentry that continuously attacks single targets until they go down or out of range.

Desc.eng: Increases base damage by +%firedamageincrease_ (30%/level)
50% of the damage is applied to a %areaincrease_ meter(1 meter/level) radius area
Enemies are slowed by %slowincrease_ (15%/level) for 5 seconds
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Increases attack range by %attackrangebonus_ meters (0.3 meters/level)

desc.eng: Shoots jets of flame in all four directions burning all enemies within a 4 meter radius. Targets are also ignited, taking a further 10% damage per second for 5 seconds.

Desc.eng: Afflicts enemies with %firevulnerability_ (15%/level) vulnerability against fire damage
Increases base damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Increases burning damage by %firedotbonus_ (5%/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap build cost by %buildcostdecrease_ (1/level)
Ignite %d enemies

desc.eng: Electrocutes all enemies within 12 meters each time it activates. The electric arcs can jump to other enemies within 5 meters of each struck enemy, dealing 90% damage. This can happen twice. The coil's activation range is 3 meters.

Desc.eng: Increases base damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
The electric arcs can jump a further %chainjumpcount_ (1/level) times
Electrocuted enemies fight %weaken_ (15%/level) less effectively for 5 seconds
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap reset time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.1 seconds/level)
Deal %d Lightning damage

desc.eng: Shoots a beam of energy at a single target continuously damaging them and slowing them by 20%.

Desc.eng: Increases base damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Slows enemies by an additional %slowincrease_ (10%/level)
Targets are frozen for %freezeduration_ seconds (1 second/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Increases attack range by %attackrangebonus_ meters (0.3 meters/level)
Deal %d Ice damage

desc.eng: Launches a fireball at enemies that deals fire damage within 4 meters of the impact point. The blast also knocks enemies down if the damage exceeds 25% of their maximum health.

Desc.eng: Trap reset time is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ (1 second/level) seconds
Increases base damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Enemies are ignited taking %firedotdamage_ (10%/level) of the original damage for 6 seconds
Decreases trap build cost by %buildcostdecrease_ (1/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Deal %d Fire damage

desc.eng: Strikes an enemy with a thunderbolt that deals Lightning damage to all enemies within 3 meters of the original target (and the original target itself). The thunderbolt arrives with a 2 second delay after the trap activates.

Desc.eng: Thunderbolt delay is reduced by %spelldelaydecrease_ seconds (0.5 seconds/level)
Increases base damage by %trapdamagebonus_ (30%/level)
Increases the area of effect by %blastrangebonus_ meters (0.5 meters/level)
Increases damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases trap reset time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.1 seconds/level)
Fully upgrade %d magical towers in one mission (only succesful missions count)

desc.eng: Releases a monster when enemies come near.

Desc.eng: Monsters have %creaturehealthincrease_ (50%/level) more maximum health
Monsters deal %creaturedamageincrease_ (50%/level) more damage
The cage releases %creaturecount_ (1/level) more monsters
Decreases dead creature replacement time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (1 seconds/level)
There is a %megamonsterchance_ (1%/level) chance that the trap will release a mutated creature which is much stronger.
Kill Slaantz, the Great Boglord

desc.eng: Releases a swarm of 5 suicide spawns who rush at the nearest enemy within their sight range and attack them. When a spawn dies, it explodes in a cloud of acid dealing poison damage within 2 meters.

Desc.eng: Increases the explosion area of effect by %blastradius_ meters (0.5 meters/level)
The nest controls %creaturecount_ (1/level) more spawns
Whenever a spawn is destroyed there is a %replacementchance_ (8%/level) chance it will be instantly replaced by a new one
Icnreases suicide blast damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases dead creature replacement time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.3 seconds/level)
Deal %d Poison damage

desc.eng: Summons archers who shoot at enemies. The post can house a maximum of 3 archers.

Desc.eng: Arrows deal damage within a %areadamage_ meter (0.5 meter/level) radius area
Archers have a %dodgechance_ (15%/level) chance of dodging none-area of effect attacks and take no damage
The post can house %creaturecount_ (1/level) more archers
Increases Archer damage by %damagebonus_ (10%/level)
Decreases dead archer replacement time by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds (0.5 seconds/level)
Score %d critical hits

desc.eng: Releases an imprisoned golem that will fight on your side until it is destroyed. The golem's attacks do area damage periodically and these attacks also knock foes off their feet. Note that the golem does not respawn and cannot be sold!
A heavy duty cannon sentry that has extreme range and lobs very slow projectiles in a high arc.
Significantly reduces trap build cost within 12 meters of its location.

effect0.eng: %trapcost_ build cost for traps around this structure

desc.eng: Significantly boosts the damage output of traps within 15 meters of its location.

effect0.eng: %trapdamagebonus_ bonus damage to traps around this structure

desc.eng: Continuously regenerates players and allied creatures within 12 meters of its location.

effect0.eng: %regenerationpercent_ of maximum health regeneration per second around this structure

desc.eng: Significantly boosts the damage output of players and allied creatures within 12 meters of its location.

effect0.eng: %playerdamagebonus_ bonus damage to players and allied creatures around this structure

desc.eng: Shoots a beam of energy at a single target continuously damaging it. The damage starts low but increases steadily the longer the beam stays on the same target.

effect0.eng: %trapdamage_ Fire damage per second starting damage

desc.eng: Launches a hooked chain at the nearest enemy. On being hit the creature is pulled into the grinder and is killed immediately. Giant-sized and special creatures cannot be crushed - in this case the chain deals damage.

effect0.eng: Pulls creatures into the grinder that shreds them into tiny pieces.

desc.eng: Squashes enemies who step between its spiked metal plates. Knocks down enemies who survive the hit.
Periodically grants essence during attack waves (but not between them).
Attacks with a metamorpher ray which can turn enemies into a chicken for a short period of time. Creatures lose 50% of their HP and all special abilities while they are transformed.

effect0.eng: Deals %trapdamage_ damage, transforms creatures with %turnchance_ chance for 10 seconds, HP reduced to 50% for the duration

desc.eng: When activated, it unleashes a poisonous wind of pestilence, dealing heavy damage to all enemies on the map. Each strike consumes Essence.

effect0.eng: Deals %trapdamage_ poison damage to all enemies

Desc.eng: Deals %trapdamage_ poison damage to all enemies
